1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Frank,
Here is the link for the webinar you requested:
http://c985816.r16.cf2.rackcdn.com/2012-01-27 12.29_Are_You_Ready_to_Go_Solo.wmv
Please let me know if you have any additional questions.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: fbguest@aol.com [mailto:fbguest@aol.com] Sent: Monday, January 30, 2012 11:15 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Webinar: Are You Ready to Go Solo?
thank you.
Frank... -----Original Message----- From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: fbguest <fbguest@aol.com> Sent: Mon, Jan 30, 2012 6:25 pm Subject: FW: MBO Partners Webinar: Are You Ready to Go Solo? Hi Frank,
I received your email from Steve and we are in the process of getting the link to the webinar for your review. Once I have it I will forward it to you so you can watch it. Please let me know if you have any questions about this.
Thanks! Nicolette
From: fbguest@aol.com [mailto:fbguest@aol.com] Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2012 10:08 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Webinar: Are You Ready to Go Solo?
Thank you Steve. I would very much like to attend the webinar but I regrettably have a networking lunch scheduled at the same time. Is there a way I can find out farther in advance when the next one is planned?
Thx again.... Frank... -----Original Message----- From: Steve Arhancet <SArhancet@mbopartners.com> To: fbguest <fbguest@aol.com> Sent: Thu, Jan 26, 2012 6:07 am Subject: MBO Partners Webinar: Are You Ready to Go Solo? Dear Frank B., Throughout our many years of working with consultants, we've gained a lot of insight and knowledge about how to successfully transition to an independent work lifestyle. I'd like to invite you to join our webinar this Friday as we discuss your readiness for a solo career. Join Aassia Haq, our CMO and Sara Conde, our Consultant Services Advisor as they discuss the top 3 questions to ask yourself before going solo. Title: Are You Ready to Go Solo? The Top 3 Questions to Ask Yourself Date/Time: Friday, 1/27, at 12:30 PM EST So, the question remains, are YOU ready? Join us and find out. Register now for this webinar. Read more about the webinar, our speakers and what you'll learn in our recent blog post. Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
